TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮时，控件将引发事件，但在控件更新记录后。 The control raises the event when an Update button in the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. （"更新" 按钮是其`CommandName`属性设置为 "Update" 的按钮控件。）可以在此事件发生时执行自定义例程，如检查更新操作的结果。(An Update button is a button control whose `CommandName` property is set to "Update".) You can perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an update operation. 对象将传递到事件处理程序，这使您可以确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records that were affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records that were affected by the update operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常， 请使用属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 若要访问更新记录的键字段值，请使用属性。To access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 您可以通过使用属性来访问原始非键字段值。You can access the original non-key field values by using the property. 您可以通过使用属性访问更新的非键字段值。You can access the updated non-key field values by using the properties. 默认情况下， 在更新操作后，控件将返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 当处理在更新操作过程中发生的异常时，可以通过 将属性设置为`true`，使控件处于编辑模式。When you handle an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the control in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example shows how to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 执行更新操作时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的 对象 `e` 。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于通常只更新一条记录，因此此属性通常包含值0或1。Because only one record is typically updated, this property usually contains a value of 0 or 1. 在不引发异常的更新操作过程中可能会发生错误。An error can occur during the update operation that does not raise an exception. 您可以使用属性来确保已更新记录。You can use the property to make sure that a record was updated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来验证是否已更新记录。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that a record was updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 。

span.span: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请将属性设置为。 `true`If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则， 控件将再次引发异常。Otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example shows how to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在更新操作过程中引发异常时，请使用属性指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了该异常。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether you handled the exception in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`时，该异常将被视为已处理，且不会由控件再次引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the control. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，则将再次引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example shows how to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作之后 控件是否应该继续处于编辑模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在完成更新操作之后该控件继续处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control will remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 在更新操作后，控件将返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 若要使控件处于编辑模式，请将属性设置`true`为。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在发生异常时使控件处于编辑模式。The following example shows how to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回 实现接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following example shows how to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已更新记录的新字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回 实现接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问用户为已更新记录的非键字段输入的新值。The following example shows how to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的原始键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含已更新记录的原始字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已更新记录的原始字段值。Use the property to access the original field values for the updated record. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回 实现接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象，这些对象表示已更新记录的字段及其原始值。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record with their original values. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问更新记录的非键字段的原始值。The following example shows how to access the original values of the non-key fields for the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/gridviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/gridviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
